meanings.definition: A type of fish with a body resembling a guitar.
meanings.sent1: The guitarfish swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a guitarfish at the aquarium yesterday.
meanings.sent3: Why did the guitarfish bring a tiny guitar to the underwater concert?
meanings.sent4: Her sleek movements in the water were as elegant as a guitarfish.
meanings.sent5: The unique shape of the guitarfish made it stand out among other fish.

meanings.sent3: Do you think we can catch a guitarfish with a guitar-shaped lure?
meanings.sent4: She hoped to guitarfish successfully in the deep waters.
meanings.sent5: The fishermen set out early to guitarfish before the sun rose.
